Modern UI Pack - v2.

Import TextMeshPro if you haven't already, otherwise you'll get errors!

Do you have any questions or requests? Contact me via 
E-mail: isa.steam@outlook.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/VXpHyUt
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Michsky
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/michsky

Special thanks to:
Geno (Contributor)
Filmos (Tester / Contributor)
Kabbouchi (Tester)
Raphael Monnerat (https://github.com/Shinao  / Contributor)
Takashi Sakai (https://github.com/mob-sakai)

Change Log v2.2.0
----------------------------------------
• Added Hamburger Menu
• Added new Blur Shaders
• Added new Animated Icons (2)
• Improved Switch
• Changed editor workflow
• Fixed Dropdown focus
• Fixed Radial Slider value issue
----------------------------------------

Change Log v2.1.0
----------------------------------------
• TextMeshPro fully integrated
• Horizontal selector added
• Range slider added
----------------------------------------

Change Log v2.0.1
----------------------------------------
• Infinite radial slider fixed
• Shader warnings are fixed
• Added namespace to the scripts
----------------------------------------

Change Log v2.0.0
----------------------------------------
• New demo scene
• New switches
• New buttons
• New editor shortcuts
• Added TextMesh Pro support
• Added new sliders
• Added gradient system
• Added blur material
• Added new icons
• Added new animated icons
• Dropdowns changed
----------------------------------------
